channel.title: NFL: Game Theory and Money
channel.description: NFL Media analytics expert Cynthia Frelund and Matt “Money” Smith focus on the most compelling matchups and unique statistical information while projecting how players and teams will perform based on advanced analytics.
channel.itunes:summary: NFL Media analytics expert Cynthia Frelund and Matt “Money” Smith focus on the most compelling matchups and unique statistical information while projecting how players and teams will perform based on advanced analytics.
channel.itunes:author: NFL

item.title: Game Theory and Money Super Bowl LIII Prediction Show
item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money Super Bowl LIII Prediction Show
item.description:
She ran 30-thousand analytic filled simulations pitting the Rams against the Patriots, and is now ready to reveal the results! Matt "Money" Smith guides us through Cynthia Frelund's sea of numbers, to find out who won most often, and what the most common score was. Cynthia also reveals which 6 individual players her computer model likes to perform the best in the game, and she sat down with Jets safety Jamaal Adams to see who he has winning. It's the ultimate Super Bowl LIII Preview!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Game Theory and Money: Conference Championship Preview
item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money: Conference Championship Preview
item.description:
Cynthia Frelund has doubled up her efforts, running analytical-based computer simulations of each Conference Championship game 20-thousand times! Find out who won each game the most often and what the likely scores will be, all while soaking in the most in-depth breakdown of the two games you're going to find anywhere.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

item.title: Game Theory and Money Divisional Round Predictions & SB Probabilities
item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money Divisional Round Predictions & SB Probabilities
item.description:
NFL analytics expert Cynthia Frelund has doubled her efforts, running 20 thousand computer simulations on the 4 big Divisional round matchups. She and Matt "Money" Smith give you the most thorough breakdown of each game you're going to find. She has exact scores for each game, plus she has updated info on which of the 8 teams has the best chance to win it all, and which one has the least.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

item.title: Game Theory and Money Playoff Predictions & Probabilities
item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money Playoff Predictions & Probabilities
item.description:
NFL analytics guru Cynthia Frelund is heading into the playoffs on a high note, after nailing 12 of 16 winners in the final week of the regular season. She ran 10-thousand simulations on each of this weeks 4 playoff games and is ready to reveal her winners. Plus she also has the probability of each team making it to the Super Bowl, and the probability each has of winning it! It's all inside this week's Game Theory and Money podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Game Theory and Money Week 17 Projections
item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money Week 17 Projections
item.description:
Not only will you get the predicted score of every week 17 game, which Cynthia Frelund came up with after running 10-thousand simulations on every matchup, but you will also get the playoff probabilities for each team still alive, AND for the first time, Cynthia's Super Bowl probability meter will tell you which team in each conference has the best chance to win the Super Bowl!


Chargers-Broncos (2:00). 49ers-Rams (5:00). Jets-Patriots (7:20). Panthers-Saints (9:50). Jaguars-Texans (12:00). Colts-Titans (16:30). Browns-Ravens (24:40). Steelers-Bengals (30:00). Eagles-Redskins (31:30). Raiders-Chiefs (33:40). Seahawks-Cardinals (39:00). Cowboys-Giants (40:25). Bears-Vikings (42:00). Dolphins-Bills (47:45). Falcons-Buccaneers (48:05). Lions-Packers (48:22). TOP 3 CONFIDENCE PICKS (49:25). NFC PLAYOFF PROBABILITIES (52:20). NFC SUPER BOWL PROBABILITIES (57:00). AFC PLAYOFF PROBABILITIES (59:15). AFC SUPER BOWL PROBABILITIES (1:04:50).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

item.title: Game Theory and Money: Week 14 Predictions and Playoff Projections
item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money: Week 14 Predictions and Playoff Projections
item.description:
"I'm not going to lie to you, but there is a scenario where the Steelers miss the playoffs."


Could Pittsburgh really find itself on the outside looking in when the playoffs start??? The 2018 season is barreling towards the playoffs, and Cynthia Frelund didn't just run 10-thousand simulations on each week 14 game, she also has every team's projected playoff odds, and some of her findings may raise an eye brow or two. Get the analytical breakdown of this week's games and the playoffs as well, in this week's Game Theory and Money podcast.


Find the prediction you're looking for: The number next to the matchup is the time stamp where you can find each game in the podcast.


Ravens-Chiefs (3:10). Saints-Buccaneers (11:00). Giants-Redskins (14:30). Lions-Cardinals (17:00). Vikings-Seahawks (20:00). Titans-Jaguars (26:45). Bengals-Chargers (30:10). FANTASY FUTURES (37:20). Eagles-Cowboys (38:30). Steelers-Raiders (42:55). Falcons-Packers (48:15). Texans-Colts (49:00). Patriots-Dolphins (51:25). Jets-Bills (52:55). Broncos-49ers (54:25). Rams-Bears (55:50). Panthers-Browns (59:20). Confidence Picks (1:01:15). NFC PLAYOFF PROJECTIONS (1:02:50). AFC PLAYOFF PROJECTIONS (1:06:25).

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Game Theory and Money NFL Week 13 Predictions
item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money NFL Week 13 Predictions
item.description:
"You want to know what I think? If you injected him with sodium-pentathol, Matt Nagy would tell you he likes Chase better."

Matt "Money" Smith really stirs things up with Cynthia Frelund on this weeks Game Theory and Money podcast. Not only do they break down why Chase Daniels may be a better fit for Chicago's offense than Mitchell Trubisky, they also think Tom Brady may be facing father time when he takes on the Vikings! Hear the logic behind both those bold statements, along with predictions for every Week 13 game.

Chargers-Steelers (1:50). Broncos-Bengals (6:30). 49ers-Seahawks (10:00). Bears-Giants (12:15). Colts-Jaguars (18:30). Chiefs-Raiders (23:30). Saints-Cowboys (28:45). Buccaneers-Panthers (35:00). Browns-Texans (38:30). Lions-Rams (41:55). Bills-Dolphins (47:30). FANTASY FUTURES (50:05). Patriots-Vikings (51:50). Cardinals-Packers (56:05). Jets-Titans (58:20). Redskins-Eagles (1:01:30). Falcons-Ravens (1:03:25). TOP 3 CONFIDENCE PICKS (1:07:30). AFC PLAYOFF PROJECTIONS (1:09:30). NFC PLAYOFF PROJECTIONS (1:12:30)


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Game Theory and Money Week 12 Projections
item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money Week 12 Projections
item.description:
Are you ready for some upsets??? Week 12 doesn't just come with loads of turkey, it also brings a number of NFL matchups that could spell the end of the losing team's playoff hopes. Cynthia Frelund ran 10-thousand simulations on every game, and this week, she's not liking as many favorites as usual, so this is a must listen podcast if you want to accurately navigate your game picks this week.

Patriots-Jets (1:40). Dolphins-Colts (4:40). Seahawks-Panthers (8:40). Steelers-Broncos (12:15). Packers-Vikings (14:40). Titans-Texans (19:15). Bears-Lions (22:55). Redskins-Cowboys (27:15). Falcons-Saints (39:15). Browns-Bengals (43:40). 49ers-Buccaneers (44:50). Jaguars-Bills (46:25). Raiders-Ravens (48:30). Cardinals-Chargers (50:00). Giants-Eagles (52:40). Fantasy Futures (55:00). Confidence Picks (55:55). NFC Playoff Projections (56:40). AFC Playoff Projections (58:30).

item.title: Game Theory and Money NFL Analytics: Week 10 Predictions
item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money NFL Analytics: Week 10 Predictions
item.description:
Cynthia Frelund is coming off yet another week where she correctly picked double digit winners! This week, her computer model is favoring a bevy of underdogs, so this is a podcast you definitely need to check out to prep for week 10. Are the Cardinals really going to keep things close with the Chiefs? How sure should you feel about the Colts holding court at home against the Jaguars? Should you trust the Patriots to run away from the Titans? And get Cynthia's updated playoff projections for both conferences! The Game Theory and Money podcast has it all!


Saints-Bengals (2:25). Patriots-Titans (4:20). Chargers-Raiders (6:15). Cowboys-Eagles (11:05). Giants-49ers (14:45). Panthers-Steelers (16:55). Cardinals-Chiefs (22:15). Redskins-Buccaneers (24:15). Falcons-Browns (26:10). Dolphins-Packers (28:55). Seahawks-Rams (30:55). Lions-Bears (35:55). Bills-jets (37:30). Jaguars-Colts (38:25). FANTASY FIVE: HIDDEN GEMS FOR WEEK 10 (40:00). Cynthia's 3 CONFIDENCE PICKS (42:00). NFC PLAYOFF PROJECTIONS (43:00). AFC PLAYOFF PROJECTIONS (44:30).

item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money: Week 9 NFL Predictions
item.description:
Cynthia Frelund and her analytics are heating up! Cynthia picked 12 of the 14 winners correctly last week, and nailed all three of her confidence picks. Now she has to try and figure out how the Aaron Rodgers-Tom Brady showdown will turn out. 

See what she thinks the score will be when it’s all said and done, along with predictions on the rest of the week 9 action.

Packers-Patriots (3:00). Chiefs-Browns (6:00). Falcons-Redskins (9:18). Titans-Cowboys (11:53). Raiders-49ers (16:00). Steelers-Ravens (19:43). Fantasy Futures (24:45). Broncos-Texans (26:05). Rams-Saints (28:20). Buccaneers-Panthers (33:25). Jets-Dolphins (36:10). Bears-Bills (37:25). Chargers-Seahawks (40:00). 3 Confidence picks (43:25). NFC Playoff Predictions (44:15). AFC Playoff Predictions (48:00).

item.itunes:title: Game Theory and Money: Week 8 Predictions
item.description:
"This just feels like an Aaron Rodgers game, right? Oh you're the new fangled offense? Oh you're the new kids, you think you're pretty special huh? Well let me show you what the greatest QB in the history of the game can do."

So do Cynthia Frelund's 10-thousand simulations of Packers-Rams agree? Go to the 37:20 mark and find out that along with the rest of the Week 8 predictions in this week's Game Theory and Money podcasts.

Redskins-Giants (3:57). Jets-Bears (6:54). Buccaneers-Bengals (10:10). Colts-Raiders (13:30). Dolphins-Texans (19:20). Ravens-Panthers (23:50). Jaguars-Eagles (28:10). Broncos-Chiefs (32:40). item.description:
Cynthia Frelund had a double digit win total in week 5 when it came to giving you the correct winners, and she's primed to do even better in week 6 on the back of a number of picks that will surprise you! She runs 10 thousand simulations on every game. So who comes out on top between the Patriots and Chiefs? Does Cleveland pick up another win? It's the Game Theory and Money podcast, analytics at its finest!

item.description:
10,000 simulations on every single week 3 match-up! Dive into the Game Theory and Money podcast this week to see if the Browns can pull off their first win, which team seems like an absolute lock to walk away a winner, plus which game has the most potential to offer up some offensive fireworks. item.title: NBA Playoffs Edition: Stevens, Morey & Lacob
item.itunes:title: NBA Playoffs Edition: Stevens, Morey & Lacob
item.description:
NFL Network Analytics Expert Cynthia Frelund sits down with Boston Celtics head coach Brad Stevens to talk about his use of analytics in coaching and his relationship with Bill Belichick and the Patriots (1:00). Also, from her visit to the Sloan Sports Analytics Conference in Boston, Cynthia speaks with Houston Rockets general manager Daryl Morey about James Harden's NFL comparison (16:25) and Warriors Assistant GM Kirk Lacob about the defining characteristics of the 2018 Golden State Warriors squad (25:31).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

item.title: WNBA Legend Sue Bird, Top Prospect Talk, Under the Radar Returns
item.itunes:title: WNBA Legend Sue Bird, Top Prospect Talk, Under the Radar Returns
item.description:
Cynthia Frelund and Matt “Money” Smith discuss the top prospects in the upcoming 2018 NFL Draft, including Penn State Running Back Saquon Barkley (5:10). Cynthia Frelund breaks down why she feels Florida State’s Derwin James is the best safety in the draft (10:40) and what his best landing spot is. Then, they deliberate over which teams can bounce back next season with some under the radar returns. Cynthia also talks about which untraditional stats she would like to see used on a larger scale nationally (27:40). Plus, Cynthia interviews WNBA Legend Sue Bird (32:05) from the Sloan Sports Analytics Conference.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Brad Stevens, Daryl Morey & Kirk Lacob
item.itunes:title: Brad Stevens, Daryl Morey & Kirk Lacob
item.description:
Cynthia Frelund and Matt "Money" Smith sit down to discuss the biggest free agency moves thus far, highlighting the Odell Beckham Jr. trade rumors, as well as the analytics angle on the Rams' newly bolstered defense and Alex Smith's potential impact on the Redskins' offensive stats (2:43). Then, Cynthia talks with Celtics head coach Brad Stevens about his use of analytics in coaching (24:44) and his relationship with Bill Belichick and the Patriots (35:31). Plus, from her visit to the Sloan Sports Analytics Conference in Boston, Cynthia speaks with Rockets GM Daryl Morey about James Harden's NFL comparison (46:52) and Warriors Assistant GM Kirk Lacob about the defining characteristics of the 2018 squad (52:20).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

item.title: Free Agency, A-Rod, Chris Cooley & Chad Pennington
item.itunes:title: Free Agency, A-Rod, Chris Cooley & Chad Pennington
item.description:
Cynthia Frelund and Matt "Money" Smith sit down to discuss the latest free agency news, highlighting the major moves at the QB position: Cousins to the Vikings, Keenum to the Broncos and Tyrod Taylor to the Browns (10:11). Also, Cynthia reveals the two teams she believes have given themselves the best chance to improve based on her models (17:03), as well as some head scratching free agency moves made by the Dolphins and the Giants. Then, Cynthia sits down with Alex Rodriguez to discuss the role analytics played in his career and he gets candid about his 2014 suspension (28:40). Plus, at the 2018 NFL Scouting Combine, Cynthia spoke with former Redskins tight end Chris Cooley (44:05) and former Jets & Dolphins QB Chad Pennington (1:01:30).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: 2018 NFL Scouting Combine Special
item.itunes:title: 2018 NFL Scouting Combine Special
item.description:
The Game Theory and Money podcast is live from Indianapolis for the 2018 NFL Scouting Combine! Listen to this extra-long episode to hear interviews with New York Jets head coach Todd Bowles (22:00), Atlanta Falcons GM Thomas Dimitroff (33:00), and former Philadelphia Eagles RB Brian Westbrook (47:00).

Also, Cynthia Frelund and Matt "Money" Smith discuss...

  • How do NFL front offices look at the combine?
  • How does Cynthia build her predictive model for college prospects?
  • Is there any reason for elite QB prospects to throw at the combine?
  • How do the elite QB prospects (Darnold, Rosen, Jackson, Mayfield, Allen) compare to one another?
  • Which drills are the best for determining future success for running backs?
  • How has the running back position has changed over the last few years?
  • The power of butts and how it relates to explosiveness
  • How height affects the meaning of metrics for WRs and CBs, and how short WRs find ways to succeed in the NFL
  • The most important metrics in scouting pass-rushers.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Offseason Preview: Free Agent QBs
item.itunes:title: Offseason Preview: Free Agent QBs
item.description:
Where should Kirk Cousins sign? Which team is the best fit for him? Cynthia Frelund and Matt "Money" Smith do a deep-dive into this free agent class of QBs to find the best fits for Cousins and Tyrod Taylor, and maybe find new starting QBs for the Minnesota Vikings and Cleveland Browns in the process. Also, Cynthia interviews Beth Mowins from the Super Bowl!

  • Where should Kirk Cousins sign? (8:00)
  • Where will Kirk Cousins sign? (14:00)
  • Which team is the best fit for Tyrod Taylor? (24:30)
  • Will Nick Foles be traded? (33:00)
  • Who is the second best free agent QB? (34:00)
  • Who will be the Vikings' QB in 2018? (39:00)
  • Cynthia Frelund interviews Beth Mowins (40:00)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.description:
NFL Media analytics expert Cynthia Frelund and Matt "Money" Smith introduce "Game Theory and Money," their new show where each week they break down the most noteworthy matchups from a statistical perspective. Cynthia and Money will provide and discuss projections for how particular players and position groups will perform based on advanced analytics.
